description:
Using nova-compute bzr 1066.

When using a compute driver that doesn't implement the set_admin_password creating a server w/ the Openstack API causes hundreds of the following exceptions to get logged to nova-compute.log:


2011-05-13 14:07:16,681 ERROR nova.compute.manager [-]
(nova.compute.manager): TRACE: Traceback (most recent call last):
(nova.compute.manager): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/compute/manager.py", line 433, in set_admin_password
(nova.compute.manager): TRACE:     self.driver.set_admin_password(instance_ref, new_pass)
(nova.compute.manager): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/virt/driver.py", line 229, in set_admin_password
(nova.compute.manager): TRACE:     raise NotImplementedError()
(nova.compute.manager): TRACE: NotImplementedError
(nova.compute.manager): TRACE:

---

Libvirt doesn't currently implement set_admin_password and as such using libvirt w/ the OSAPI causes these types of exceptions in nova-compute.log.
title: logging loop when drivers don't implement set_admin_password

Using nova-compute bzr 1066.

When using a compute driver that doesn't implement the set_admin_password creating a server w/ the Openstack API causes hundreds of the following exceptions to get logged to nova-compute.log:


2011-05-13 14:07:16,681 ERROR nova.compute.manager [-]
(nova.compute.manager): TRACE: Traceback (most recent call last):
(nova.compute.manager): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/compute/manager.py", line 433, in set_admin_password
(nova.compute.manager): TRACE:     self.driver.set_admin_password(instance_ref, new_pass)
(nova.compute.manager): TRACE:   File "/usr/lib/pymodules/python2.6/nova/virt/driver.py", line 229, in set_admin_password
(nova.compute.manager): TRACE:     raise NotImplementedError()
(nova.compute.manager): TRACE: NotImplementedError
(nova.compute.manager): TRACE:

---

Libvirt doesn't currently implement set_admin_password and as such using libvirt w/ the OSAPI causes these types of exceptions in nova-compute.log.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dan-prince
